com.flowpowered.react.constraint

Class BallAndSocketJoint.BallAndSocketJointInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.Joint.JointInfo
      • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.BallAndSocketJoint.BallAndSocketJointInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    BallAndSocketJoint

    public static class BallAndSocketJoint.BallAndSocketJointInfo
extends Joint.JointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a ball-and-socket joint. This structure will be used to create the actual ball-and-socket joint.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BallAndSocketJointInfo(RigidBody rigidBody1, RigidBody rigidBody2, Vector3 initAnchorPointWorldSpace)
      Constructs a new ball and socket joint info from both bodies and the initial anchor point in world space.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the anchor point in world space.
